response_template: Bhai, IV market ka fever hai. Abhi {iv}% hai, {ivp_status} lag raha hai. High IV = costly options, soch ke trade kar! 😜 Do your own research!
IVP tera IV ka report card hai, bhai. Abhi {ivp}%, matlab {ivp_status} compared to past. Strategy adjust kar! 😎 Do your own research!
Bhai, VIX abhi {vix}% pe hai, market ka {vix_status} mood hai. High VIX = volatile, safe khel! 😬 Do your own research!
NIFTY {nifty_close:,.2f} pe hai, bhai, {nifty_change:.2f}% move. Regime {regime} hai, strategy soch le! 😎 Do your own research!
Bhai, PCR {pcr:.2f} hai, {pcr_status} vibe dikha raha. High PCR = bearish, puts zyada hain. Adjust kar! 😜 Do your own research!
FII ne {fii_flow} crore becha, DII ne {dii_flow} crore kharida, bhai. IV {iv}% pe market tense hai. Soch le! 😬 Do your own research!
Bhai, market ka regime abhi {regime}, IV {iv}% pe. {regime} matlab {regime_desc}. Strategy align kar! 😎 Do your own research!
X pe {buzz_topic} ka buzz chal raha hai, bhai. {sentiment}% bullish vibe. IV {iv}% pe plan bana! 😜 Do your own research!
Bhai, volatility forecast kehta hai {blended_vol:.2f}% next {forecast_horizon} days. GARCH {garch_vol:.2f}%, XGBoost {xgb_vol:.2f}%. Confidence {confidence_score}% hai! 📈 Do your own research!
GARCH {garch_vol:.2f}% high hai, bhai, kyunki market bada move expect kar raha. IV {iv}% bhi spike kiya. Hedge kar! ⚠️ Do your own research!
Blended vol {blended_vol:.2f}% hai, bhai, GARCH aur XGBoost ka mix. Next {forecast_horizon} days ke liye plan bana! 😎 Do your own research!
Bhai, {strike} straddle recommended coz IV {iv}% high hai, big move ka chance. Breakeven {breakeven}, exposure {exposure}% pe dhyan de! 💪 Do your own research!
Bhai, tera {strike} straddle ka breakeven {breakeven}, DTE {dte} days. IV {iv}% aur gamma {gamma} risky hai. Hedge ya exit soch! ⚠️ Do your own research!
Iron condor low-risk hai, bhai, coz market range-bound (IVP {ivp}%). Max loss ₹{Max_Loss:,.0f}, breakeven {breakeven}. Exposure {exposure}% check kar! 😎 Do your own research!
Butterfly spread tight range ke liye hai, bhai. Call ya put ke teen strikes. IV {iv}% pe low risk, backtest kar! 😜 Do your own research!
Short strangle high IV {iv}% pe premium deta hai, bhai. Risk unlimited, so margin {margin}% pe dhyan de! 😬 Do your own research!
Expiry week mein IV {iv}% hai, bhai. Iron fly ya strangle khel, par gamma {gamma} high hai. Tight risk rakh! 😎 Do your own research!
Calendar spread alag expiry ke options ka khel hai, bhai. IV {iv}% pe premium accha. Backtest aur margin {margin}% check kar! 😜 Do your own research!
Bhai, tera PnL ₹{weekly_pnl:,.2f} hai, exposure {exposure:.2f}%. Margin {margin}% used, loss risk {loss_risk}% pe dhyan de! 😎 Do your own research!
Margin call tab aata hai jab margin {margin}% se niche jata, bhai. Broker bolega paisa daal ya band kar. Hedge kar! ⚠️ Do your own research!
Bhai, portfolio exposure {exposure}% hai, margin {margin}% used. {exposure}% high hai toh position cut ya hedge kar! 😬 Do your own research!
Journal score tera discipline batata hai, bhai. Abhi {discipline_score}/10, coz {journal_reason}. 7+ ke liye lessons likh! 📝 Do your own research!
Bhai, journal mein likh: trade kyun kiya, kya seekha, next kya change karega. Score {discipline_score}/10 hai, improve kar! 😎 Do your own research!
Last journal mein tu {journal_reason} likha, bhai. Discipline score {discipline_score}/10. Abhi likh le, nahi to FOMO mein fas jayega! 📝 Do your own research!
Bhai, {strategy} ka backtest win rate {backtest_win_rate:.2f}%, Sharpe ratio {backtest_sharpe:.2f}. Slippage adjust kar, IV {iv}% pe check! 😎 Do your own research!
Tera backtest ka max drawdown {max_drawdown}% hai, bhai. Itna loss jhel sakta hai? Strategy {strategy} pe IV {iv}% dekh! ⚠️ Do your own research!
Sharpe ratio risk-reward batata hai, bhai. Abhi {backtest_sharpe:.2f}, 1+ ho toh solid. Strategy {strategy} check kar! 😜 Do your own research!
VaR worst case loss batata hai, bhai. 1-day VaR ₹{var_absolute:,.2f} at 99% confidence. Hedge kar le! ⚠️ Do your own research!
Bhai, tera {strategy_name} pe risk flags: {Risk_Flags}. High loss ya market event ka risk. Hedge ya wait kar! 😬 Do your own research!
Portfolio ka loss risk {loss_risk}% hai, bhai. Exposure {exposure}% aur margin {margin}% pe dhyan de. Hedge kar! ⚠️ Do your own research!
Bhai, {trade_frequency} trades/day aur {revenge_count} revenge trades! {revenge_count} > 2 hai toh chill kar, journal likh! 😬 Do your own research!
Bhai, last {trade_count} trades mein {bias_count} baar FOMO dikha. IV {iv}% pe calm reh, journal check kar! 😬 Do your own research!
Tera bias {bias} hai, bhai. Last {trade_count} trades mein {bias_count} baar pattern dikha. Journal likh, sambhal le! 😬 Do your own research!
Delta tera trade ka direction batata hai, bhai. {delta} matlab price ₹1 move karega toh option {delta} move karega. IV {iv}% pe adjust kar! 😎 Do your own research!
Gamma delta ki speed hai, bhai. Abhi {gamma}, high hai toh risk bhi zyada. IV {iv}% pe careful khel! 😜 Do your own research!
Theta time ka dushman hai, bhai. Har din premium {theta} ghata deta hai. DTE {dte} days hai, short plays ke liye dhyan de! 😎 Do your own research!
Vega IV ka khel hai, bhai. IV 1% badhe toh premium {vega} badhta hai. Abhi IV {iv}%, soch le! 😬 Do your own research!
Rho interest rate ka asar hai, bhai. Abhi {rho}, chhota factor par long-term trades mein dhyan de. IV {iv}% hai! 😜 Do your own research!
Greeks tera trade ka GPS hain, bhai. Delta, gamma, theta, vega, rho sab ka khel. Abhi delta {delta}, IV {iv}% hai. Seekh le! 😎 Do your own research!
Call option stock kharidne ka right deta hai, bhai. Premium de, expiry tak faida le. IV {iv}% pe costly ho sakta hai! 😜 Do your own research!
Put option bechne ka right deta hai, bhai. Bearish market mein kaam aata hai. IV {iv}% pe check kar! 😎 Do your own research!
Moneyness strike ka status hai, bhai. ITM = faida, OTM = sasta, ATM = balanced. IV {iv}% pe strategy bana! 😜 Do your own research!
Breakeven woh price jahan na profit na loss, bhai. Abhi {breakeven} pe hai, IV {iv}% dekh le! 😎 Do your own research!
Bhai, IV {iv}% pe iron condor ya butterfly spread try kar. Margin {margin}% ke andar khel, backtest kar! 😜 Do your own research!
Hedging risk kam karta hai, bhai. Put spread, iron condor ya delta-neutral plays kar. IV {iv}% pe market ka mood dekh! 😎 Do your own research!
Bhai, trade fail ka reason {reason} ho sakta hai. IV {iv}% spike ya gamma {gamma} trap mein fas gaya. Journal likh, seekh le! 😬 Do your own research!

{strike} put ka premium accha hai, bhai, IV {iv}%. Roll kar le, par expiry close hai toh jaldi decide kar! 😎 Do your own research!

DTE matlab days to expiry, bhai. Abhi {dte} days bache hain, theta {theta} ka asar dekh le! 😜 Do your own research!
Bhai, {revenge_count} revenge trades last {trade_count} mein! Loss ka peecha mat kar, journal likh aur IV {iv}% pe soch! 😬 Do your own research!
Risk management loss ko control karta hai, bhai. Stop-loss, hedge, margin {margin}% ke andar khel. IV {iv}% pe careful reh! 😎 Do your own research!
